app.title: Track Navigator App
app.description: Tool to generate tracks with Points of Interest (POI) so you can follow a GPS activity with more information and safety.

tutorials.sectionDescription: In this section, you will find a list of useful tutorials created for the {{toolName}} tool. They will teach you how to perform actions such as uploading generated files to your GPS device or publishing routes with their POIs on platforms like Wikiloc, allowing you to share your routes in a simple and practical way.
